attributes.action: Make it mandatory for all football teams to wear their club badge on shirts
attributes.additional_details: The badge is a symbol of what a club and its supporters represent and to not have it placed on the teams kit in official games is hugely disrespectful to the club and it’s supporters. The players and supporters turn up for the pride of the badge, without it, there is nothing to play for.
attributes.background: Put pressure on the FA, UEFA and Premier League to ensure that all teams playing in their competitions wear their official club badge on their football kits to avoid atrocities such as the current kit worn by Manchester City.

rejection.details: Decisions about kit worn by football players are for individual clubs, rather than the UK Parliament or Government.
